resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: The skeleton looking off to its left is an indication of the missing sections of the original artwork. Tranditional danse macabre images involve multiple layers of society and of all ages. Here we can only see the higher levels of society, but in 'La danse macabre' at Abbaye De La Chaise-Dieu we can see the varying layers of society are portrayed.<a title="The Danse Macabre at La Chaise Dieu" href="https://www.abbaye-chaise-dieu.com/visites/la-danse-macabre-du-xve-s/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://www.abbaye-chaise-dieu.com/visites/la-danse-macabre-du-xve-s/
resource.chars: The skeleton looking off to its left is an indication of the missing sections of the original artwork. Tranditional danse macabre images involve multiple layers of society and of all ages. Here we can only see the higher levels of society, but in 'La danse macabre' at Abbaye De La Chaise-Dieu we can see the varying layers of society are portrayed.https://www.abbaye-chaise-dieu.com/visites/la-danse-macabre-du-xve-s/

item.value: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M3711.69558,59.80954h94.8556v0h94.8556v87.38982v87.38982h-94.8556h-94.8556v-87.38982z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_dec266ab-b1b0-4f32-8c6a-e67b5aabb308" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: This image is a particularly interesting portrayal as it contains distinctive layers of perspective - background, middleground, foreground - many of the danse macabre images are often 2D images, often cartoon-like. When compared to the popular Holbein woodcuts , this depiction is particularly elaborate.
resource.chars: This image is a particularly interesting portrayal as it contains distinctive layers of perspective - background, middleground, foreground - many of the danse macabre images are often 2D images, often cartoon-like. When compared to the popular Holbein woodcuts , this depiction is particularly elaborate.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: According to Elina Gersman's essay The Dance of Death in Reval (Tallinn): The Preacher and his Audience the artwork in it's 'current state measures approximately 160 x 750 cm and features thirteen life-size-figures'.<a title="The Dance of Death in Reval - E. Gertsman" href="https://doi.org/10.2307/25067083" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://doi.org/10.2307/25067083

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Music and Death have been linked together and portrayed via various different mediums. A popular modern take on the danse macabre is Disney's "The Skeleton Dance"<iframe src="//www.youtube.com/embed/vOGhAV-84iI" width="560" height="314" allowfullscreen="allowfullscreen">
resource.chars: Music and Death have been linked together and portrayed via various different mediums. A popular modern take on the danse macabre is Disney's "The Skeleton Dance"
